Graphics Cards.name: Graphics Cards
Graphics Cards.description: Graphics cards are hardware components that enhance the graphical performance of a computer system.

attributes.name: Graphics processor
attributes.description: The graphics processor is responsible for rendering and displaying images on the screen.

attributes.name: Graphics card memory type
attributes.description: The graphics card memory type determines the speed and efficiency of data storage and retrieval.

attributes.name: HDMI
attributes.description: HDMI (High-Definition Multimedia Interface) is a digital audio/video interface used for connecting graphics cards to displays.

attributes.name: Graphics card family
attributes.description: The graphics card family refers to a group of graphics cards that share similar features and capabilities.

attributes.name: Discrete graphics card memory
attributes.description: Discrete graphics card memory is dedicated memory used by the graphics card for processing and storing graphical data.

attributes.name: Graphics processor family
attributes.description: The graphics processor family refers to a group of graphics processors that share similar architectures and capabilities.

Power products.name: Power products
Power products.description: Products that provide power supply and battery backup for various devices.

attributes.name: Power supply unit (PSU) form factor
attributes.description: The physical size and shape of the power supply unit.

attributes.name: 80 PLUS certification
attributes.description: Certification for power supplies that meet certain energy efficiency standards.

attributes.name: Purpose
attributes.description: The intended use or application of the power product.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: The color of the power product.

attributes.name: Output power capacity
attributes.description: The maximum power output of the power product.

attributes.name: Total power
attributes.description: The total power capacity of the power product.

attributes.name: Display type
attributes.description: The type of display used on the power product.

attributes.name: Battery technology
attributes.description: The technology used in the power product's battery.

attributes.name: Battery size(s)
attributes.description: The size or sizes of the batteries used in the power product.

attributes.name: Battery voltage
attributes.description: The voltage of the power product's battery.

attributes.name: Form factor
attributes.description: The physical size and shape of the power product.

attributes.name: Cabling type
attributes.description: The type of cables used in the power product.

attributes.name: Power supply type
attributes.description: The type of power supply used in the power product.

attributes.name: Compatibility
attributes.description: The devices or systems that the power product is compatible with.

attributes.name: Battery capacity
attributes.description: The capacity or energy storage of the power product's battery.

attributes.name: Brand compatibility
attributes.description: The brands or manufacturers that the power product is compatible with.

attributes.name: Output power
attributes.description: The power output of the power product.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: The type or category of the power product.

attributes.name: Number of batteries included
attributes.description: The number of batteries included with the power product.

attributes.name: Battery type
attributes.description: The type of battery used in the power product.

Pcs and workstations.name: Pcs and workstations
Pcs and workstations.description: This category includes PCs and workstations for various professional and personal computing needs.

attributes.name: Chassis type
attributes.description: The type of chassis used in the product.

attributes.name: Maximum internal memory supported by processor
attributes.description: The maximum amount of internal memory that the processor can support.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: The color of the product.

attributes.name: Processor manufacturer
attributes.description: The manufacturer of the processor used in the product.

attributes.name: Total storage capacity
attributes.description: The total storage capacity of the product.

attributes.name: HDD capacity
attributes.description: The capacity of the hard disk drive (HDD) in the product.

attributes.name: Processor family
attributes.description: The family of the processor used in the product.

attributes.name: Graphics card family
attributes.description: The family of the graphics card used in the product.

attributes.name: Product type
attributes.description: The type of product.

attributes.name: Operating system installed
attributes.description: The operating system installed on the product.

attributes.name: Panel type
attributes.description: The type of panel used in the product.

attributes.name: Storage media
attributes.description: The type of storage media used in the product.

attributes.name: Internal memory
attributes.description: The internal memory capacity of the product.

attributes.name: Processor model
attributes.description: The model of the processor used in the product.

attributes.name: SSD capacity
attributes.description: The capacity of the solid-state drive (SSD) in the product.

attributes.name: Product family
attributes.description: The family of the product.

attributes.name: Discrete graphics card memory
attributes.description: The memory capacity of the discrete graphics card used in the product.

attributes.name: Processor codename
attributes.description: The codename of the processor used in the product.

Motherboards.name: Motherboards
Motherboards.description: Motherboards are the main circuit boards that connect all the components of a computer system.

attributes.name: Processor manufacturer
attributes.description: The brand or company that manufactures the processor.

attributes.name: Processor socket
attributes.description: The physical interface that connects the processor to the motherboard.

attributes.name: Supported processor sockets
attributes.description: The types of processor sockets that are compatible with the motherboard.

attributes.name: Motherboard form factor
attributes.description: The size and shape of the motherboard.

attributes.name: Motherboard chipset family
attributes.description: The family or series of chipsets that the motherboard belongs to.

attributes.name: Motherboard chipset
attributes.description: The specific chipset model used on the motherboard.

attributes.name: Power source type
attributes.description: The type of power source required by the motherboard.

attributes.name: Component for
attributes.description: The type of computer system or device that the motherboard is designed for.

attributes.name: Graphics card family
attributes.description: The family or series of graphics cards that are compatible with the motherboard.

attributes.name: Cables included
attributes.description: The type and number of cables included with the motherboard.

attributes.name: Controller interface type
attributes.description: The type of interface used for connecting external devices to the motherboard.

Toner Cartridges.name: Toner Cartridges
Toner Cartridges.description: Toner cartridges are essential components for laser printers and copiers, providing high-quality prints and efficient performance.

attributes.name: Brand compatibility
attributes.description: The toner cartridges are compatible with various printer brands, ensuring seamless integration and optimal printing results.

attributes.name: Quantity per pack
attributes.description: Each pack of toner cartridges contains a specific quantity, allowing for convenient replacement and cost-effective printing.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: The toner cartridges are available in different colours, enabling users to choose the one that suits their preferences or specific printing needs.

attributes.name: Colour toner page yield
attributes.description: The toner cartridges offer a high page yield for colour printing, ensuring long-lasting performance and reducing the need for frequent replacements.

attributes.name: Printing colours
attributes.description: The toner cartridges support multiple printing colours, allowing for vibrant and accurate reproduction of images and documents.

attributes.name: OEM code
attributes.description: Each toner cartridge has a unique OEM code, facilitating easy identification and compatibility verification.

attributes.name: Black toner page yield
attributes.description: The toner cartridges provide a high page yield for black printing, ensuring efficient and reliable output for text and monochrome documents.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: The toner cartridges are available in different types, such as standard or high-capacity, catering to various printing requirements.

attributes.name: Supply type
attributes.description: The toner cartridges are available as original equipment manufacturer (OEM) supplies, guaranteeing compatibility and optimal performance.

Computer Monitors.name: Computer Monitors
Computer Monitors.description: A category of electronic displays used as computer screens.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: The color of the computer monitor.

attributes.name: Display technology
attributes.description: The technology used in the computer monitor's display.

attributes.name: Display
attributes.description: The size of the computer monitor's display.

attributes.name: Screen shape
attributes.description: The shape of the computer monitor's screen.

attributes.name: HD type
attributes.description: The type of high-definition technology supported by the computer monitor.

attributes.name: 3D
attributes.description: Whether the computer monitor supports 3D display.

attributes.name: Display resolution
attributes.description: The resolution of the computer monitor's display.

attributes.name: AMD FreeSync type
attributes.description: The type of AMD FreeSync technology supported by the computer monitor.

attributes.name: Backlight type
attributes.description: The type of backlight used in the computer monitor.

attributes.name: Panel type
attributes.description: The type of panel used in the computer monitor's display.

attributes.name: Refresh rate
attributes.description: The refresh rate of the computer monitor's display.

attributes.name: Display brightness (typical)
attributes.description: The typical brightness level of the computer monitor's display.

attributes.name: Supported graphics resolutions
attributes.description: The graphics resolutions supported by the computer monitor.

attributes.name: Touchscreen
attributes.description: Whether the computer monitor has touchscreen functionality.

attributes.name: Market positioning
attributes.description: The target market segment for the computer monitor.

attributes.name: Response time
attributes.description: The response time of the computer monitor's display.

Ink Cartridges.name: Ink Cartridges
Ink Cartridges.description: Ink cartridges are essential for printing documents and images.

attributes.name: Printing colours
attributes.description: The number of colours that can be printed with the ink cartridge.

attributes.name: Quantity per pack
attributes.description: The number of ink cartridges included in each pack.

attributes.name: BCP bubble graphic colour
attributes.description: The color of the BCP bubble graphic on the ink cartridge.

attributes.name: Brand compatibility
attributes.description: The brands of printers that the ink cartridge is compatible with.

attributes.name: Box contents
attributes.description: The items included in the ink cartridge box.

attributes.name: Colour ink volume
attributes.description: The volume of color ink in the cartridge.

attributes.name: OEM code
attributes.description: The original equipment manufacturer code for the ink cartridge.

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: The type or model of the ink cartridge.

attributes.name: Colour
attributes.description: The color of the ink cartridge.

attributes.name: Colour ink cartridges quantity
attributes.description: The number of color ink cartridges included in the pack.

Networking Cables.name: Networking Cables
Networking Cables.description: Products in this category are used for networking purposes.

attributes.name: Cable length
attributes.description: Specifies the length of the cable.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: Indicates the color of the cable.

attributes.name: Cable standard
attributes.description: Refers to the standard that the cable complies with.

attributes.name: Connector contacts plating
attributes.description: Describes the plating material used on the connector contacts.

attributes.name: Conductor type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of conductor used in the cable.

attributes.name: Connector(s)
attributes.description: Refers to the type of connector(s) used in the cable.

Headphones speakers and accessories.name: Headphones speakers and accessories
Headphones speakers and accessories.description: This category includes headphones, speakers, and accessories for audio devices.

attributes.name: Bluetooth
attributes.description: Bluetooth technology for wireless connectivity.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: Different color options available for the products.

attributes.name: Brand compatibility
attributes.description: Compatible with specific brands of audio devices.

attributes.name: Subwoofer connectivity
attributes.description: Ability to connect to a subwoofer for enhanced bass.

attributes.name: Connectivity technology
attributes.description: Various connectivity options like Bluetooth, wired, or both.

attributes.name: Ear coupling
attributes.description: Different types of ear coupling for headphones.

attributes.name: Product type
attributes.description: Different types of products like headphones, speakers, or accessories.

attributes.name: Headset type
attributes.description: Different types of headsets like over-ear, on-ear, or in-ear.

attributes.name: Rechargeable
attributes.description: Products with rechargeable batteries.

attributes.name: Microphone type
attributes.description: Different types of microphones available in the products.

attributes.name: RMS rated power
attributes.description: Power rating of the products in RMS.

attributes.name: Compatible products
attributes.description: Products compatible with specific audio devices or brands.

attributes.name: Recommended usage
attributes.description: Recommended usage scenarios for the products.

Keyboards and mice.name: Keyboards and mice
Keyboards and mice.description: This category includes keyboards and mice for various purposes.

attributes.name: Connectivity technology
attributes.description: The technology used to connect the keyboard or mouse to a device.

attributes.name: Keyboard layout
attributes.description: The arrangement of keys on the keyboard.

attributes.name: I/O ports
attributes.description: The input/output ports available on the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: Purpose
attributes.description: The intended use or function of the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: Product colour
attributes.description: The color of the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: HP segment
attributes.description: The segment or target audience for the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: Pointing device
attributes.description: The type of pointing device included with the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: Sensor type
attributes.description: The type of sensor used for tracking movement on the mouse.

attributes.name: Rechargeable
attributes.description: Indicates whether the keyboard or mouse is rechargeable.

attributes.name: Power source type
attributes.description: The type of power source used for the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: Movement detection technology
attributes.description: The technology used to detect movement on the mouse.

attributes.name: Form factor
attributes.description: The physical form or shape of the keyboard or mouse.

attributes.name: Device interface
attributes.description: The interface used to connect the keyboard or mouse to a device.

attributes.name: Buttons quantity
attributes.description: The number of buttons on the mouse.

attributes.name: Keyboard language
attributes.description: The language layout of the keyboard.

attributes.name: Keyboard key switch
attributes.description: The type of key switch used in the keyboard.

attributes.name: Scroll type
attributes.description: The type of scrolling mechanism on the mouse.

attributes.name: Recommended usage
attributes.description: The recommended usage or application for the keyboard or mouse.
